description:
Fujii Akihito is the father of http://anidb.net/ch98574 [Natsuo]. He began to date http://anidb.net/ch99130 [Tachibana Tsukiko], after Akihito`s wife died and he becomes the stepfather of http://anidb.net/ch96674 [Hina] and http://anidb.net/ch96673 [Rui] after remarrying Tsukiko.
Source: Domestic Girlfriend Wiki
name: Fujii Akihito
